name: 232 CREATIVE
description:
232 Creative is a full-service marketing and creative agency located in Pittsburgh, PA. We specialize in marketing, multimedia, web and branding. 

Created by Mike Miller and Ryan Stetz, 232 Creative helps our partners realize their business goals through the development and execution of various strategies and tactics, including: digital and tradition marketing, web development and design, video production, brand development, photography, social media, marketing strategy, advertising and much more.
At 232 Creative, we love working with entrepreneurs, creative professionals and employees of businesses who may not have the staff, the time or the expertise to grow their businesses. 
Let's meet our goals, together.
